scripts.start: npm run build && concurrently "npm run start:backend" "npm run start:frontend"
scripts.build: tsc && npx tailwindcss -i ./src/frontend/styles.css -o ./dist/styles.css && cp src/frontend/index.html dist/index.html
scripts.dev: npm run build && nodemon --exec node --loader ts-node/esm dist/backend/server.js
